settings.title: Why You Will Love the Reusable Baking Mats:
settings.text:
Why You Will Love the Reusable Baking Mats:

Ditch the single-use baking paper and experience the ease of these long-lasting sheets.

Cleaning is made easy as food doesn't stick to the silicone mat

Made from food-grade silicone, these baking mats are a breeze to clean and durable enough to last for years of regular use

settings.title: The Specifics of the Reusable Baking Mats:
settings.text:
The Specifics of the Reusable Baking Mats:

The Specifics of the Reusable Baking Mats:

2 x Silicone Baking Mats in each set

Made from food-safe silicone (BPA free)

Durable, Flexible, and Stretchable

Measurements: 30cm x 39.5cm

Oven use up to 230 degrees C

Dishwasher safe

To avoid staining please clean your mat thoroughly between each use with warm, soapy water.

settings.title: Sustainable Shipping:
settings.text: Shipping cost, materials, carbon offset, and estimated delivery times can be found HERE.

settings.description_text:
Our reusable safety razors are a little different from the plastic kinds lining supermarket shelves. They're ultra-sustainable as you only need to change the blades and will last for years when cared for properly. We even take back the blades for recycling through our Blade Take Back program.

These safety razors are super easy to use and make shaving a breeze. Couple this with our low-waste Shaving Soap, then simply lather up and you're good to go. Gentle pressure is key, you can let the weight of the stainless steel do the work for you!
settings.video_text: This text helps you provide some more detail to the title above.

settings.title: Product Features:
settings.text:
PLASTIC FREE. No more disposable plastic shavers in our landfills and oceans - just replace the blades.

UNISEX! Great for everyone. Face, legs, underarms, bikini - this Safety Razor can shave everywhere. 

SUSTAINABLE. Refill blade packs are available at a super affordable price and we even take back your old ones for recycling.

SIMPLICITY.Our Razors are a simple screw mechanism and two top holding plates - super durable with less parts that can break compared to a butterfly razor.

settings.title: Instructions for Use:
settings.text:
1. Unscrew the head of the razor from the handle. 

2. Place blade between the two top plates, holding by the blunt edges. 

3. Screw the handle back on and shave away!

4. Replace the blade when it goes blunt. On average this is every fifth shave, less for thick hair, more for fine hair. 

5. Rinse the Razor thoroughly after each use. Clean away soap and hair then let dry out of the shower.

Store your Razor safely out of the shower between uses and take care not to drop your Razor. We have very detailed instructions set out HERE in the blog and you can watch the video above to see how the Safety Razor is constructed. 

TOP TIP: Use gentle pressure - let the weight of the stainless steel do the work for you!

settings.title: The Specifics of the Copper Safety Razor:
settings.text:
Copper Razor is made from Stainless Steel Type 304 20% and Zinc Alloy 80%.

The Copper colour is electroplated into the Stainless and Zinc Alloy. The Copper isn't a layer and cannot 'come off'. Please rinse the Razor thoroughly to prevent discolouration from soap residue.

Dimensions - 9.4cm Handle, 4.4cm Blade Holding Plate

Secure screw in blade with 2 top holding plates for durability and safety. Blade is held tightly between these two plates and you can shave with both sides. Stainless steel replacement blades and blade returns envelope included.

settings.title: What Exactly is Included:
settings.text:
1 x Stainless Safety Razor - Available in Three Great Colours

5 x Stainless Steel Blades 

1 x Blade Return Envelope

settings.title: The Cali Blade Take Back Program:
settings.text:
We take Sustainability seriously. In this world, it's impossible to be perfect when the whole system seems to be against our best intentions. BUT...something as small as changing your razor can save hundreds of pieces of plastic every year.

If you send your used blades back to us clean and dry, we will repurpose or recycle them! 

If you are looking for a collection point near you or our Return address you will find that information HERE. 

USE- Use, love and shave sustainably until the blades are no longer sharp enough for the job

DRY- Clean the blade and dry thoroughly

POST- back to us! Once you have 40 or more, seal the supplied envelope and wrap it into another (so the postman/postwoman hands are safe) then post your blades back to CaliWoods. We accept them even if they are from another brand. Considering the end-of-life of a product and closing the waste loop is part of our product stewardship - getting the good stuff going here in NZ.

REPURPOSE- This bit is our job. Most councils and recycling centres don't accept single blades because of their small size and sharp edges. Using people power and the magic of squirrelling these blades away over time, we have a few ideas for using the material and/or there will be enough to feasibly recycle

settings.faqs_title: How long does it take to get my products?
settings.faqs_text:
Domestic shipping can take up to 5 business days.

Foreign shipping could take up to 14 business days.

Due to global supply chain challenges, shipping times could be longer than usual.

settings.faqs_title: Do you offer warranty for your products?
settings.faqs_text:
All our products are subject to quality control.

Our warranty provides a guarantee against manufacturer defects.

The guarantee covers any manufacturing, design, or material defect. Please notify us within 2 months of noticing any defects.

It does not cover blows, improper use, or other issues that are not attributable to a manufacturer defects.

Yes, we offer full and partial refunds.

Please enquire for more information about our Refund policy.

Yes! We offer Cali Razor Replacement Parts. We are serious about creating products that last for ages and giving customers the right to repair. If anything should ever happen to your Razor, or you lose a part, we have the separate pieces available via email order.

settings.title: Is the Un-Baking Paper BPA free?
settings.text: Un-Baking Paper is 100% BPA free. It is made from food grade silicone which is BPA free.

settings.title: Can it be used in the microwave?
settings.text: Yes, it can be used in the microwave.

settings.title: Is the Un-Baking Paper suitable to use under the grill?
settings.text: Yes, but only up to 250 degree celsius.

settings.title: Can I put the Un-Baking Paper in the dishwasher?
settings.text: Yes, it is dishwasher safe.

settings.title: Is it suitable for Air Fryers?
settings.text: Un-Baking Paper is not suitable for Air Fryers as it will prevent the air from circulating through the food.

settings.heading: CaliWoods Is On A Mission:
settings.description: We are an NZ-owned, Woman-led certified Social Enterprise. This means that we are for-profit, but the main thing we wake up for in the morning is our purpose; to reduce waste and stand up for Mama Earth. We are certified by Ākina.

Single-use plastic is a massive culprit for the pollution of our oceans, emissions, and the health of Papatūānuku, Mother Earth. CaliWoods is passionate about providing you with reusable, high quality, and long-lasting alternatives.  If you haven't already checked them out, see our Shop Eco range for a more sustainable home, bathroom and kitchen.
